## Business task

-   analyse data on wellness tracker usage

-   get insight about how people use tracker of other companies

-   provide recommendations on market strategy for Bellabeat

## Key insights

-   activity, MET, and sleep trackers are the most popular

-   heart rate and weight trackers are the least popular

-   weight trackers are either not popular or they are not user-friendly

-   most of weight data is uploaded manually
